rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C124309

self.title: CDISC SDTM Tumor or Lesion Properties Test Result Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the results from the assessment or measurement of a tumor, lesion or site of disease.
name: Tumor or Lesion Properties Test Result
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Tumor or Lesion Properties Test Result Terminology
synonyms: Tumor or Lesion Properties Test Result

terms.definition: Not existing in a specified place at a specified time. (NCI)
An increase in size, volume, quantity or scope in comparison to normal or previous state.
Incapable of being handled, touched or felt through palpation. (NCI)
Capable of being handled, touched or felt through palpation. (NCI)
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time. (NCI)
Leaving no doubt; not open to question. (NCI)

An overall level of substantial worsening in non-target disease that is of a magnitude that, even in the presence of SD or PR in target disease, the treating physician would feel it important to change therapy. (RECIST)
